name: cordova-plugin-googletagmanager-ios
description: Cordova plugin for adding GoogleTagManager to cordova-ios projects that are already using cordova-plugin-firebase

scripts.eslint: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint www && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint src && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint tests

author: Enes Yalcin
